title: Pilot Metropolitan Collection Fountain Pen, Black Barrel, Classic Design, Fine Nib, Black Ink (91111)
feature: Pilot's sleek Metropolitan Collection signature pens
Finest quality at a mid-range price
Ships with 1 Pilot black ink cartridge and 1 Pilot Press Plate Converter
description: Fresh and modern, the Pilot MR Metropolitan Collection delivers refined style. Meticulously designed with a brass barrel and stainless accents and nib, Metropolitan is available in three sophisticated colors; black, burnished silver and champagne gold, with premium matte finishes. Elegant and refined, Pilot MR Metropolitan is the perfect gift of affordable luxury for yourself and others. Fresh and modern, the Pilot MR Metropolitan Collection delivers refined style.
